title: Wheel
description:
A wheel with a rubber tire.

May be used in reference to wheels, tires, or vehicles with wheels. May also be used in expressions with 'wheel' like third wheel or hell on wheels.
apple_vendor_description: The wheel emoji on Apple devices is rendered as a classic, robust wheel, often appearing with a dark, slightly metallic rim and a prominent central hub. Appleâ€™s characteristic glossy 3D shading gives it a sense of depth and solidity, making it look ready for motion. This emoji symbolizes transportation, progress, innovation, or a crucial component of a larger system, evoking a feeling of forward momentum and mechanical integrity.
